text: Pratapgarh is a census town in West Tripura district in the Indian state of Tripura. ==Geography== Pratapgarh is located at . ==Demographics== India census, Pratapgarh had a population of 25,890. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Pratapgarh has an average literacy rate of 72%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 77%, and female literacy is 67%. In Pratapgarh, 11% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Politics== Pratapgarh assembly constituency is part of Tripura West (Lok Sabha constituency). ==References== Category:Cities and towns in West Tripura district Category:West Tripura district
title: Pratapgarh, Tripura
